io.github.kushnirvladyslav

Class ControlledListFuture

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.github.kushnirvladyslav.ControlledListFuture

  • public class ControlledListFuture
extends Object
    Manages and controls a list of futures with shared scheduler. Provides functionality to track, monitor and control scheduled tasks across multiple instances.

    Features:

    • Shared scheduler across all instances for resource efficiency
    • Periodic cleanup of completed futures
    • Thread-safe operations
    • Configurable cleanup period
    Since:
    2025-07-31
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Vladyslav Kushnir

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ControlledListFuture()
      Creates a new ControlledListFuture with default cleanup period (1 second).
      ControlledListFuture(long period, TimeUnit timeUnit)
      Creates a new ControlledListFuture with specified cleanup period.

      Restarts the cleanup process with new period settings.
      void stopAll()
      Cancels and removes all monitored futures.
